title: Schadenfreude

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have Schadenfreude inflict terror on the investigatives of the town by killing at least 1 of them.

desc:
Post 4866
Lcorp He
Threat 44
Before starting the game, choose 3 people, if they are not a investigative role, they become one
If they are part of an evil faction, they become a traitor with a town investigative role for said faction if said faction does not have investigative roles itself. Neutral roles become town from this effect. People may reroll said investigative role twice and may use a scroll to reroll said role, but it will always end in an investigative role without their knowledge.
When investigated, start a countdown of phases
The countdown starts at the amount of phases not visited
Once the countdown reaches 0, the investigative role dies
You will always be seen as a random role, that is part of the investigators faction
if you die before the countdown reaches 0, the countdown immeadily reaches 0 and the investigator dies
